attributes.action: mandatory Healthcare Insurance for all migrants entering the UK
attributes.additional_details: Its about time we, a tax paying Nation protect what we pay for, which is our Health Service,  We need to introduce a mandatory Healthcare Insurance, whether they are in the EU or not, so that anyone entering the UK, for what ever reason, has a valid insurance policy in place to cover them when they are taken ill or need hospital treatment.  We cannot go to any other country and receive free healthcare....why do we allow this?!!!!!
